Database models

class taho.database.models.Server(**kwargs: Any)
class Meta
await get_guild(bot: AutoShardedBot) → Guild

Get the discord.Guild object for this server.

await get_info(key: str) → Optional[Union[str, int, float, None]]

Gets the value of a key in the cluster’s info.

Raises KeyError if the key does not exist.

await get_member(bot: AutoShardedBot, user_id: int) → Optional[Member]

Returns a discord.Member object for the user.

await get_role(bot: AutoShardedBot, role_id: int) → Optional[DRole]

Returns a discord.Role object for the role.

await set_info(key: str, value: Optional[Union[str, int, float, None]]) → None

Sets the value of a key in the cluster’s info. If the value is None, the info is deleted.

Raises KeyError if the key does not exist (only for deletion).

class taho.database.models.ServerCluster(**kwargs: Any)
class Meta
await create_role(bot: AutoShardedBot, role: DRole, type: RoleType) → Role

Configure a RP role on a cluster. Raises exception if: - RoleException: The role already exists; - RoleException: The role is not common to all guilds of the cluster.

await get_common_discord_roles(bot: AutoShardedBot) → Dict[str, List[DRole]]

Get all the roles that are common to all the guilds in the cluster. A role is common if it is named the same way in all the guilds.

await get_commun_discord_role(bot: AutoShardedBot, role: DRole, servers: List[Server] = None) → List[DRole]

Returns a list of discord.Role objects that are common to all the guilds in the cluster. A role is common if it is named the same way in all the guilds.

The difference between this method and get_common_discord_roles is that this method returns the roles in common with the one given as parameter, whereas get_common_discord_roles returns all the roles that are common to all the guilds in the cluster.

await get_discord_guilds(bot: AutoShardedBot) → List[Guild]

Returns a list of discord.Guild objects for all the guilds in the cluster.

await get_discord_members(bot: AutoShardedBot, user_id: int) → List[Member]

Returns a list of discord.Member objects for all the members of the guild.

await get_info(key: str) → Optional[Union[str, int, float, None]]

Gets the value of a key in the cluster’s info.

Raises KeyError if the key does not exist.

await get_roles(bot: AutoShardedBot) → Dict[Role, List[DRole]]

Returns a dictionary of roles on all guilds.

await set_info(key: str, value: Optional[Union[str, int, float, None]]) → None

Sets the value of a key in the cluster’s info. If the value is None, the info is deleted.

Raises KeyError if the key does not exist (only for deletion).
